text: Ambroise Uwiragiye (born 31 December 1980) is a Rwandan long distance runner who specialises in the marathon. He competed in the men's marathon event at the 2016 Summer Olympics where he finished in 99th place with a time of 2:25:57. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Rwandan male long-distance runners Category:Rwandan male marathon runners Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Rwanda
title: Ambroise Uwiragiye
